source.label: Info for those with normal blood pressure

cards.summary: Warning: Potential hypertensive emergency. Consult doctor immediately.
cards.detail: Your blood pressure is too high.  Seek treatment immediately.  Systolic BP > 180 mmHg and/or diastolic BP > 120 mmHg may indicate a hypertensive emergency.;https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.15018;;at-most-one;https://www.heart.org/en/health-topics/high-blood-pressure
